text: The first experiments have begun, and the results are already proving useful.
The infected subjects show no loss of mental capacity.
However, the parasites appear to subtly influence their minds, though we have yet to determine how.
Subjects who have been infected the longest claim that we—the uninfected—look sick.
This may suggest the parasites induce hallucinations, convincing the hosts that the uninfected are the ones who must be eliminated.
These findings bring us one step closer to understanding, and ultimately ending, these creatures.
